sheet_title: Title 24 CF-1R Energy Compliance Reports (HVAC, Water Heating, IAQ)
description: Four tiled CF-1R (Certificate of Compliance - Residential Performance Compliance Method) report pages covering HVAC systems, water heating, indoor air quality / lighting provisions, and the overall compliance summary with TDV margins. Continues from sheet T-1. Climate Zone 8, performance compliance method using CBECC-Res.
key_content: HVAC system specifications (type, efficiency ratings SEER2/HSPF2/AFUE)
Indoor air quality / mechanical ventilation provisions
Compliance summary table with TDV margins (heating, cooling, water heating, total)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: HVAC efficiency numeric values (composited at small scale)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: water heater UEF/EF values
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: duct R-value specifics
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: TDV compliance margin values
NOT SHOWN: PV solar system specifications (required for new detached ADU per Title 24 â€” may be on another sheet or absent)

drawing_zones.content: CF-1R Form: HVAC system specifications (type, efficiency, duct specs)
